alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 2:16AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations up to 6 inches for eastern Sierra communities along Highway 395 with 8 to 16 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting up to 50 mph in the lower elevations and 80 to 100 mph over Sierra Ridges. * WHERE...Mono County. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to whiteout conditions. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Be prepared for long travel delays or adjust your travel plans to avoid periods of heavy snow and whiteout conditions.
